fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - As long as this role is in the game, even if you're dead, anyone, including yourself, who misspells this role's name or refers to it by something other than its name in any in-game channel is removed from the game and banned from the server. (Referring to this role as "it" when it's already been brought up and it's clear what "it" refer to doesn't count.)

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player to paripapparapappapparappa each night. You'll deal a Paripapparapappapparappowerful attack to them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Paripapparapappapparappa all who would oppose you.
